parameters:
Regulus: "What's the matter?... To contact me directly like
this, it must be quite an urgent matter, right?"

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "Yes, that's right! If it's you, the top of
'Banter', you might be able to do something about this
critical situation."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "I haven't heard anything from Akelnar who is with
you, though."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "That child would give me a proper report. Not at a
selfish timing like yours. However, considering that..."

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "It's a race against time! I want all agents
to be summoned to Ansei Residence High School. Maybe... I
can't stop it alone."
\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "Stop it?..."

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "Yeah, I know what you want to say! Our
mission is to observe, right? But if we just do that, it'll
be too late!"

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "Too late?... Are you saying a dangerous Poison has
awakened?"

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "Probably not just one. At least three... no,
there might be even more."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "Are you saying multiple Poisons have appeared
simultaneously?"

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "But there have been no reports from Akelnar, nor
has there been any panic. From an objective point of view,
the crisis seems virtually non-existent..."

\F[sirius_trouble]Agent Sirius: "They're all cleverly hiding their true
identities! It must be some kind of 'fetish'! It happened by
chance, but..."

\F[sirius_trouble]\AA[N]Regulus: "By chance? A 'fetish' has triggered another
'fetish'?"

\F[sirius_trouble]Agent Sirius: "That might be the case! But it's more
dangerous if the damage spreads under the surface, right?
Before anyone realizes it... it becomes untouchable."
\F[sirius_trouble]\AA[N]Regulus: "..."

\F[sirius_trouble]\AA[N]Regulus: "If what you're saying is true... it is indeed a
grave situation."

\F[sirius_trouble]\AA[N]Regulus: "Understood. I will dispatch Agents Vega, Altair,
and Deneb."

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "Aren't they all rookies?! I'm begging you, I
want everyone to come. You included. Even then, I don't know
if we can stop it..."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "If what you're saying is true, stopping it would
be impossible."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "We, the agents of the Cabinet Office's direct
Poison Special Task Force 'Banter', are all Kaizon. We're
terribly incompatible with Poisons that come to brainwash us
with pleasure!"

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "That's why I'm saying this isn't the time for
such talk!"
\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "Do you intend to fight?"

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "I just want to protect everyone. I don't want
my friends to fall prey to Poison!"
\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "..."

\F[sirius_trouble]Agent Sirius: "You understand, right? Now that Iris Impact
isn't here... we're the only ones who can do it. So..."

\F[sirius_trouble]\AA[N]Regulus: "Yes! Then we will strengthen our surveillance.
However, we will not intervene. That is the duty given to us
'Banter' agents!"
\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "You stubborn fool!!"

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "You should stay put. If you fall into Poison's
trap and get corrupted..."
\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "It would lead to an irretrievable situation."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "'Banter's strongest agent. You bear the codename
'Sirius', given to the brightest shining agent."

\F[sirius_angry]\AA[N]Regulus: "Carry out your mission in coordination with
Akelnar. That is all I can say."

\F[sirius_angry]Agent Sirius: "Damn it!!... As stubborn as ever, Lady
Regulus! Looks like I have no choice but to do something
about it myself!"
A
体験版終わり
次回予告

\F[beni_smile]Akane: "That's it for the demo! There are still plenty of
monsters lurking in the academy."

\F[beni_angry2]Akane: "If I could, I wouldn't want to fight... but it seems
that's not an option..."
\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Are they all perverts?"

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Well, since the monsters are specialized in
fetishes... they're perverts in a sense..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Perverts to the extreme... I might be
interested."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Eh!? No... I think it's better not to get
involved..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "What kind of monsters are coming up? I might
awaken to such perversions myself, so I want to prepare my
heart."

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "No way! I'll protect you before you get attacked by
any monster!"

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_kamenero]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Hehehe♪ Making promises you can't keep♪ Seeing
me turned into a blindfolded slave, you got excited too,
didn't you, Akane?"

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_kamenero]\AA[1]Akane: "Stop it! Nadeshiko being attacked by a monster... I
can't even..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "So tell me. What kind of monsters will appear
next?"

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Ugh... First there's Closet-Poison. Their fetish is
confined space sex."

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "They love to embrace in tight spaces... That's why
they lurk in lockers and pounce on you."

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Lockers...? I feel like I've seen that kid
around..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Whoa! No, no!! You mustn't go near lockers or such.
You'll get caught and end up loving close-contact H..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Close-contact H... sounds like it could feel
good though."

\F[beni_laugh]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[1]Akane: "If it were with you, Nadeshiko, it would be the
best..."

\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[1]Akane: "...That's why it's no good!! It's exactly what the
monster wants!"
\F[beni_trouble]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "What else? Is that the end...?"

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "There's also a super dangerous monster called
Reverse-Poison. They wield the bitchification ability that
wreaked havoc even in the main story."
\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Bitchification?"

\F[beni_smile]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "It means turning into a pervert who gets horny
anywhere and sleeps around."
\F[beni_smile]\FF[nako_trouble]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Isn't that a bit different...?"

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_trouble]\AA[1]Akane: "Anyway, the terrifying thing about Reverse is that
they look 'no different than usual.' If you let your guard
down, they'll reveal their true nature and corrupt you."

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "So basically, don't let your guard down... got
it."
\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Yeah. Even if you think nothing has changed..."

\F[beni_kobi]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "Hehehe! Smoking weed and sucking dick is seriously
the best♪"

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_true]\AA[1]Akane: "...they might be saying things like that behind your
back."
\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_trouble]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Scary... That's a terrifying monster..."

\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_trouble]\AA[1]Akane: "There are still more monsters hiding out there. But
we won't lose! We'll expose and crush all of the monsters'
schemes!"
\F[beni_angry2]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "You're so reliable... That's the spirit!"

\F[beni_smile]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[1]Akane: "So look forward to the main story! I think you'll
enjoy even more chain corruption."

\F[beni_smile]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[2]Nadeshiko: "Please enjoy our downfall, as well as our
fighting spirit in contrast!"

\F[yuri_smile]\FF[nako_smile]\AA[1]Yurika: "Stay tuned. We won't disappoint. If you could write
your impressions of the demo on Ci-en or Twitter, or show
your support, we'd be happy."
\F[yuri_smile]\FF[beni_trouble]\AA[2]Akane: "Whoa, she cut in!"

\F[nako_smile]\FF[beni_trouble]\AA[1]Nadeshiko: "Then let's wrap this up together, all three of
us."
\F[nako_smile]\FF[beni_trouble]\AA[2]Akane: "With someone like her..."
\F[yuri_smile]\FF[beni_trouble]\AA[1]Yurika: "Is 'ready' okay? Then let's go. Ready~"
なこ笑み
紅笑み
百合花笑み

Akane, Nadeshiko, Yurika: "Please support Agent Sirius~ Even
girls vulnerable to pleasure want to protect the academy
from the brainwashing monsters~!"
\C[3]Would you like to save?
